accessAsAnyone.description: Default permission for marking something as available to anyone

viewAllBackgroundJobs.description: Allows to view all jobs listing and details for each job in any queue

viewOwnBackgroundJobs.description: Allows to view own jobs listing and details for each own job in any queue

deleteAllBackgroundJobs.description: Allows to delete all jobs in any queue

deleteOwnBackgroundJobs.description: Allows to delete own jobs in any queue

manageBackgroundJobs.description: Allows to start/stop/pause/restart queues the jobs listing and details for each job

wsViewOwnJobsStatus.description: Allows to get real-time notifications about all jobs details for each job in any queue

wsViewAllJobsStatus.description: Allows to get real-time notifications about own jobs details for each own job in any queue

mainMenu.comment: This defines the main menu that will go into the sidebar
